app.title: GrowUp
app.subtitle: Create tasks, set rewards, and track XP easily. Everything stays in your browser.

hero.title: GrowUp helps children build healthy habits through motivation, not pressure.
hero.subtitle: A playful system that turns daily tasks into growth, responsibility, and real-life learning.

problem.title: The problem GrowUp solves
bullets: Kids don’t see the value of daily responsibilities.
problem.note: GrowUp was created to change this dynamic.

solution.title: What is GrowUp?
solution.body: GrowUp is a family-friendly, gamified system that helps children develop responsibility, consistency, and autonomy.

items.title: Daily Tasks
items.body: Children complete daily tasks set by parents or educators.

items.title: Earn XP & Level Up
items.body: Tasks generate XP that unlocks levels and progress.

items.title: Shop & Inventory
items.body: XP unlock shared family experiences, stored in an inventory.

items.title: Keep the Journey Going
items.body: Rewards fuel motivation and restart the growth cycle.

skills.title: What children learn
skills.note: GrowUp turns everyday actions into lifelong skills.

difference.title: Why GrowUp is different
difference.note: GrowUp focuses on learning, not control.

audience.title: Built for everyone who supports children

educators.label: For Educators:
educators.body: Support responsibility and habit-building in a playful way.

privacy.title: Privacy and trust
privacy.note: Built with privacy and children’s safety in mind.

cta.title: Start helping children grow — one day at a time.
cta.subtitle: Join the beta or explore the demo experience today.

settingsDialog.title: Settings
settingsDialog.clearAllWarning: This will remove all data stored in this browser. You may be logged out. Only your synced data is saved in the cloud and will be restored after you log in again.
settingsDialog.clearAllConfirmMessage: This will remove all data stored in this browser. You may be logged out. Only your synced data is saved in the cloud and will be restored after you log in again.
settingsDialog.deleteAccountWarning: This will permanently delete your account and all associated data.

profiles.duplicateMessage: A profile with this name already exists. Please choose another.

levelUp.title: Level up!
levelUp.subtitle: Great job! Keep going to earn more XP.

auth.title: Account
auth.checkEmail: Check your email to confirm your account.
auth.acceptTermsPrefix: I have read and agree to the
auth.acceptTermsRequired: You must accept the terms of use to continue.

terms.title: Terms of Use – GrowUp
terms.intro: By creating an account or using GrowUp, you agree to the terms and conditions below. If you do not agree, do not use the service.
terms.section1Body: GrowUp is an educational and organizational tool designed to help families and educators encourage positive habits, responsibility, and autonomy in children through tasks, rewards, and family experiences. GrowUp does not replace the supervision, guidance, or responsibility of parents, legal guardians, or educators.
terms.section2Title: 2. Use by children and parental consent
terms.section2Body: GrowUp is intended for use by children only with verifiable consent from a parent or legal guardian, as required by applicable laws including LGPD, GDPR, and COPPA. By creating an account, the legal guardian declares that:
terms.section2Item1: They have legal authority to authorize the child’s use of the app;
terms.section2Item2: They give explicit consent for the collection and use of data necessary to operate GrowUp;
terms.section2Item3: They are responsible for supervising the child’s use of the app;
terms.section2Item4: They can review, manage, or delete the child’s information at any time.
terms.section3Body: You are responsible for the accuracy and updating of the information provided during registration and for the proper use of the account. GrowUp is not responsible for:
terms.section3Item1: Incorrect, incomplete, or outdated information provided by the user;
terms.section3Item2: Misuse of the account by third parties who have authorized access.
terms.section4Body: The XP, levels, rewards, and allowance conversion system is purely educational and motivational. GrowUp:
terms.section4Item1: Does not provide financial, educational, or psychological advice;
terms.section4Item2: Does not guarantee specific behavioral or learning outcomes;
terms.section4Item3: Does not perform payments, transfers, or real financial transactions;
terms.section4Item4: Any allowance-related value is defined, managed, and delivered exclusively by the legal guardian.
terms.section5Body: Items in the store represent symbolic experiences or family agreements with no intrinsic financial value. Delivery, execution, validity, and conditions of these experiences are the sole responsibility of the family or institution using GrowUp.
terms.section6Title: 6. Privacy and data protection (LGPD, GDPR, and COPPA)
terms.section6Intro: GrowUp follows privacy by design and data minimization practices, collecting only the data strictly necessary to operate the app.
terms.section6_1Item4: Technical information required to operate the service. We do not intentionally collect sensitive data from children.
terms.section6_2Item3: Comply with legal obligations. We do not sell personal data and do not show targeted ads to children.
terms.section6_3Item1: When required by law or court order;
terms.section6_3Item2: With service providers strictly necessary to operate the app, under confidentiality and data protection agreements.
terms.section6_4Item1: Request access to the child’s data;
terms.section6_4Item4: Revoke consent, acknowledging that this may limit use of the service. Requests can be made through GrowUp support channels.
terms.section7Body: GrowUp may suspend or terminate accounts that:
terms.section7Item1: Use the service illegally, abusively, or fraudulently;
terms.section7Item2: Attempt to violate the security or integrity of the system;
terms.section7Item3: Use the app for purposes incompatible with its educational intent.
terms.section8Item3: Experience temporary interruptions. We do not guarantee continuous, uninterrupted, or error-free availability.
terms.section9Body: GrowUp may terminate the service or individual accounts at any time, with or without prior notice, in compliance with applicable legal obligations. Users may stop using the service at any time.
terms.section10Body: All rights related to GrowUp, including name, brand, characters, texts, design, illustrations, animations, and code, belong to their respective owners. Reproduction, distribution, or commercial exploitation without prior authorization is prohibited.
terms.section11Body: These Terms of Use may be updated periodically to reflect service improvements or legal changes. When required by law, we will request renewed consent from the legal guardian.
terms.section12Body: These Terms of Use are governed by the laws applicable to the service’s location of operation, respecting data protection laws including LGPD, GDPR, and COPPA. In case of conflict between translations, the original version prevails.
terms.noteBody: GrowUp is a tool to support family education and does not replace the active role of parents, guardians, or educators.
